name: vbc-explorer
description: A modern blockchain explorer for VirBiCoin network with NFT support, contract verification, and real-time statistics
author: Aoi Emerauda

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.clean: rm -rf .next && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .env && rm -rf .env.local && rm -rf .env.development.local && rm -rf .env.test.local && rm -rf .env.production.local
scripts.sync: cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=1024 NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1200' ts-node --project tsconfig.tools.json tools/sync.ts
scripts.stats: cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=768' ts-node --project tsconfig.tools.json tools/stats.ts
scripts.richlist: cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=768' ts-node --project tsconfig.tools.json tools/richlist.ts
scripts.tokens: cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=768' ts-node --project tsconfig.tools.json tools/tokens.ts
scripts.price: cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=256 NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=384' ts-node --project tsconfig.tools.json tools/price.ts
scripts.cleanup-accounts: cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=768' ts-node --project tsconfig.tools.json tools/cleanup-accounts.ts
scripts.sync-tokens: cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=512 NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=768' ts-node --project tsconfig.tools.json tools/sync-tokens-to-contracts.ts
scripts.all: cross-env MEMORY_LIMIT_MB=1024 NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=1200' ts-node --project tsconfig.tools.json tools/sync.ts all
